knimeNode.name: data.world Table Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a data.world Dataset file (tabular data only).

fullDescription.intro: Reads a table of data from a specified data.world Dataset file. Note that files in a Dataset that do not contain tabular data (and thus are not accessible for direct querying on data.world) are not supported by this node.
fullDescription.option: Specify the URL of the file to be read from a data.world Dataset. For ease of use, simply navigate to the Dataset on https://data.world and then to the specific file within that Dataset; copy-paste the URL from the browser into this field. More specifically, the URL can be of the format used at https://data.world for any Dataset file there (e.g. https://data.world/jonloyens/an-intro-to-dataworld-dataset/workspace/file?filename=DataDotWorldBBallStats.csv) but can also be specified via a short path (e.g. jonloyens/an-intro-to-dataworld-dataset/DataDotWorldBBallStats.csv) or even as an abbreviated short path (e.g. an-intro-to-dataworld-dataset/DataDotWorldBBallStats.csv) assuming the account matches the user credentials used to access data.world services.

ports.outPort: Table of data from data.world Dataset File.
